welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mahmutlu! This charming coastal town is known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Mahmutlu has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erzincan Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles the transportation of goods and packages at Erzincan Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
